Package org.wmn4j.notation.builders

Class MeasureBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.notation.builders.MeasureBuilder
  • public class MeasureBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for building Measure objects. The methods isFull and isVoiceFull should be used for checking if the durations add up to the correct amount to fill up the measure according to the specified time signature. Default values: TimeSignature : 4/4 KeySignature : C-major/a-minor Clef: G Barlines (right and left): Single. No clef changes.

      • getClefChanges

        public java.util.Map<Duration,​Clef> getClefChanges()
        Returns the clef changes in this builder. The keys in the map are the offset values of the clef changes measured from the beginning of the measure.
        Returns:
        clef changes currently set for this builder. Durations are offsets from the beginning of the measure.

      • totalDurationOfVoice

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        sum of the durations of the in the voice

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull​(int voice)
        Returns true if the voice with the given number is full. A voice is considered full when the durations in it are enough to fill a measure with the time signature set in this builder. The voice may contain more durational elements than fit in a measure with the time signature set in this builder.
        Parameters:
        voice - the number of voice that is checked
        Returns:
        true if the durations in the voice add up to fill a measure

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Returns true if any voice in this builder is full. A voice is considered full when the durations in it are enough to fill a measure with the time signature set in this builder. The voice may contain more durational elements than fit in a measure with the time signature set in this builder.
        Returns:
        true if even a single voice is full. False otherwise.

      • isOverflowing

        public boolean isOverflowing​(int voice)
        Returns true if the total duration of the durational elements in the voice with the given number is more than can fit into a measure with the time signature set in this builder.
        Parameters:
        voice - the number of the voice that is checked
        Returns:
        true if the total duration of the durational elements in the voice exceed what can fit in the measure

      • isOverflowing

        public boolean isOverflowing()
        Returns true if any voice in this builder is overflowing. A voice is overflowing if the total duration of the durational elements in the voice is more than can fit into a measure with the time signature set in this builder.
        Returns:
        true if any voice in this builder is overflowing

      • trim

        public void trim()
        Trims the excess durations from this builder. The durational elements that start from this builder and would continue onto the next measure are reduced in duration to fit into a measure with the time signature set in this builder.

      • build

        public Measure build()
        Returns a Measure with the values set in this builder. Voices that do not contain enough durational notation elements are padded with rests at the end. If any voice has a total duration that exceeds what can fit into a measure with the time signature set in this builder, then those voices are trimmed by discarding the exceeding durations. Any durational that partly fits in the measure is reduced in duration to fit into the built measure.
        Returns:
        a measure with the values set in this builder

      • build

        public Measure build​(boolean padWithRests,
                     boolean trim)
        Returns a Measure with the values set in this builder.
        Parameters:
        padWithRests - set this to true to pad the voices that do not fill the measure with rests
        trim - set this to true to trim the durational elements whose durations exceed what can fit into the measure
        Returns:
        a measure with the values set in this builder
